dialogue.text: After you two finish singing, Garcello wipes his tears
You feel a smile run across your face as you slowly start to walk towards him
Before you could get any closer to him, you start to hear a rumbling noise coming near Garcello's direction
The wall behind Garcello shatters into a million pieces as if it were made of glass
After the dust goes away, you realize that the corruption tracked the three of you into the alleyway
Before you could say anything, the corruption grabs a hold of Garcello and starts pulling him in
The corruption swallows your friend whole right in front of you, wishing you could've saved him
After a couple seconds of silence, it starts moving again, this time, forming something in front of you
Realizing what you have to do, you grab your microphone, grip Pico's gun harder, and proceed to battle your deceased friend...
